title: Demoted from Silver To Bronze without warning.  AGAIN.
body: I thought there was supposed to be an explicit warning!   I have one bad luck day of feeders and enemy smurfs and you kick me back to b1?  I'm this close to never playing again.  There's no point playing a game I cant win.

replies.body:
See, the only reason it would demote you is if your MMR is pretty darn low, so odds are all your games "is S5" were probably against B2-B3 players. It's also generally a bad habit to blame a loss on a feeding team/enemy smurfs (fyi most smurfs win their placement matches and come out around Silver-Gold so the amount of smurfs in B is comparatively low, there are people who are climbing but that's different), whether they were the reason for you loss or not, it's better to focus on what you could have done better and prepare for the next.

Also I understand the frustration attached to that because I had to work my way out of B1 twice. Although I was back out the second time really quickly, focus the frustrated energy towards a positive direction. 

Good luck!
No, there's no warning. If you lose a game at S5 0 LP and your mmr is low, you get demoted.
How am I supposed to raise my MMR if I can't get matched in fair games?   Even pro players can't 1v5...do normals affect mmr?
no. normals and ranked have seperate mmr
You belong in bronze. That's all there is to it.
